column5: Anyone know of the action up on Eagle lake or can tell me anything about it?.going up on aug 24th for some fishing and a bear hunt. Any help would be appreciated.

By late August, Fish the deeper areas off of the main lake for walleyes. Obviously, Osbourne bay is good but check other mainlake areas like Lake points, the reefs around and past Temple Bay, deep water basin-side edge of islands and the entrances of bays like Froghead, Boulder, Spring,etc... I've always done well trolling livebait spinner rigs/minnows when the weather cooperates. In crummy weather the fishing slows and we do better jigging.
